headline: Crist, Fried, Taddeo slam DeSantis, go easy on each other at Orlando forum
author: Steven Lemongello
sentences: The main message from the trio was that Democrats could not afford to lose the governors office again to DeSantis, whom they blamed for a bevy of ills ranging from a narrow focus on culture wars to ignoring economic issues.
U.S. Rep. Charlie Crist, Florida Agriculture Commissioner Nikki Fried and state Sen. Annette Taddeo, all spoke at the Democratic Womens Club of Floridas annual convention held at the Rosen Centre.
Ron DeSantis but held off on criticizing each other during a forum in Orlando on Friday night.
The three major Democratic candidates for governor slammed Republican Gov.
